description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Audiobooks: The Fastest Growing Format.

buildup.text: Audible, acquired by Amazon in 2008, transformed audiobooks from niche to mainstream entertainment.

discovery.text: Commuters, exercisers, and multitaskers embraced audiobooks â€” creating reading time where none existed before.

twist.text: The debate rages: is listening to a book really 'reading'? Neuroscience says the brain processes both similarly.
